heroTitle: CliffRise is a way to give something back to the cliffs that give us so much - with every purchase supporting the creation of new routes and the care of climbing areas in Bulgaria.

features: Suitable for dry or wet skin

features: Suitable for dry or wet skin

products.title: Premium Climbing Essentials
products.description: Every product sold contributes directly to new climbing route development. Choose quality gear that gives back to the climbing community.

impact.title: Real Impact, Real Routes
impact.description: See how the CliffRise community is making a difference in climbing areas. Every purchase leads to tangible results and leaves a lasting impact on the climbing community.
impact.routesFundedDesc: New climbing routes developed through community purchases
impact.contributedDesc: Total funds directed to route development projects
impact.climbersImpactedDesc: Community members who have accessed new routes
impact.projectDescription: Our most recent funding helped establish 20 new routes at Teteven, Zaslona. These routes provide intermediate climbers with routes in the range 5c-8a and have become some of the most popular climbs in the area.

notification.routeFunding: This purchase helps fund new climbing routes!

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.emptyDesc: Add some products to get started
cart.routeFunding: 100% of profits go to route development

eventsSection.normalTextOne: it was a weekend full of climbing, smiles, and time outdoors. Climbing during the day, yoga, and meeting cool people, sharing stories and ideas - all against the backdrop of beautiful Teteven. An event that showcased
eventsSection.boldedTextTwo: how strong and vibrant the climbing community is
eventsSection.normalTextTwo: and left a desire for this to be just the beginning.
